msbt.message: Look at you! Giving the gift of clothing—so fashion-forward. Well, allow me to return the favor. I've sent along a little prezzie. Try it on! I picked it out especially for you, so I'm sure it will look fab!
Thank you for the fab clothing gift! It'll be so nice to have something new to wear next time I go out. And guess what! I have a stylish gift for you too. Aren't we the fashionable friends!
The gift you sent me—you know how I ADORE clothing! And I couldn't have asked for a better fit! Now, the gift I've sent in return is gently used, BUT I think it suits your style perfectly! Enjoy!
Goodness, I do adore receiving hard-to-find items as presents! I'm still debating where to put the stunning piece of furniture you sent me. Thank you, my dear! Now, take this token of my gratitude.

I must admit you surprised me with your gift of furniture! It's an inspiring piece too, though I've yet to decide where to put it. Decisions! Decisions! Anyhoo, I've sent along a gift for you. Surprise!
Thank you for the furniture! Your selection was so YOU and very touching. Now, I can't allow myself to simply receive a present—I must send one too. May this gift make you as happy as yours made me!
Thank you for the charming piece of furniture! What a coincidence that I already had a piece exactly like it. Well, I got you this in return. I do hope you don't already have one!

Thank you so much for the present! Simply delicious, darling! You know JUST what to pick out for me. I'd like to think I can do the same for you. Well, see the gift I've sent here and decide for yourself!
Thank you so much for your lovely gift. To think that such unassuming things will transform into things of great beauty. Life is magical, indeed! Please, take this and know that I am grateful.

Thank you for the present! It is beautiful AND eco-friendly! And the gift of a sapling is a gift that just keeps growing. Now, I must figure out where to plant it! In the meantime, please enjoy this gift.

Let me guess... You couldn't decide what kind of gift to send, so you sent me money. Am I right? Not to worry! I appreciate the gesture. But now MY gesture is to use that money to buy YOU this gift! Ha!

I listened very closely to the music you sent me, and now the melody is stuck in my head! Of course, every time I hear it, I think of you. So, I'd like you to have this. I do hope it makes you think of me too!
How thoughtful of you to send such a practical present! I'm not terribly handy, but it's something I'm sure I'll use! I do hope you get some use out of my present too.
The fossil you gave me—what a gift! It contains the secrets of the ancient world! I get chills just thinking about it. I'll cherish it always—thank you. Please, accept this gift in return.

I admit, I didn't realize you'd sent me a fossil at first. I thought it was a rock. Silly me! What a surprise! And it hasn't been appraised yet, so another surprise awaits! Well anyhoo, please enjoy this gift.
I've had this wall decor hanging on my walls for some time. It was old and I was about to refresh it when you sent me the new one as a gift! Are you psychic? Did you foresee this thank-you gift too?
Thank you for the present! Just knowing that you were thinking of me and took the time to send a gift has raised my spirits. In return, this is for you. I hope it raises your spirits similarly!
